column4: hey I am getting an error when I try to do a sudo apt-get install -f to install the nvidia drivers: says cannong remove /usr/src/nicidia-185blah blah no such file or directory
X never comes up, but it says [OK]
whats control-alt-f7 do? I just rebooted, trying to see if that fixes it
that goes to the consoles  F7 is normally the X display however.
